Introduction
This topic contains information on actions that precede a decision on an apportionment claim, including
first steps following receipt of a claim for an apportionment
estimating the amount of benefits VA should withhold for an apportionment
issuing notice of a proposed adverse action
undertaking development with the claimant
establishing the estimated withholding
, and
handling a request for a hearing
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Apportionment Process
citation: Part VII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
